sch_to_bom[source]

sch_to_bom(v:"verbose", overwrite:"update existing schematic", root:"project root directory"='.')

Update/create BOM from KiCad schematic.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

bom_to_sch[source]

bom_to_sch(v:"verbose", overwrite:"update existing schematic", root:"project root directory"='.')

Update KiCad schematic from BOM file.
